radiographic_examinations.findings: A 2-3 mm nodule in the right lung base, a couple subcentimeter hypodensities in the right hepatic lobe, abnormal dilatation of the main pancreatic duct measuring up to 5 mm, a small subcentimeter hypodensity in the spleen, multiple cortically based hypodense lesions in bilateral kidneys compatible with simple cysts, enlarged appendix measuring up to 2.0 cm with adjacent fat stranding, a tiny pocket of rim enhancing fluid adjacent to the tip of the appendix measuring 6 x 8 mm, mild thickening of the distal terminal ileum, and reactive mild thickening of the cecum.
